section.title: xc5dat.inc
section.programlisting: 00001 * ------------------- File 5 subsections weight ------------------------ 00002 PARAMETER (MAXPES=100) 00003 COMMON / XC5DAT / NRPES,NPES,NBTPE(10),INTPE(10),PES(MAXPES) 00004 * 00005 * NRPES number of interpolation ranges (E,weight) 00006 * NPES number of pairs (E,weight) 00007 * NBTPE interpolation ranges 00008 * INTPE interpolation laws 00009 * PES pairs (E,weight), weight tabulation 00010 * 00011 *-----------------------------------------------------------------------
